newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch May manufacturing sales rise four pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Dutch May manufacturing sales rise four pct yr/yr.

text.p: Dutch May manufacturing sales were some four percent higher than in May 1996, the Central Bureau of Statistics said.

The CBS manufacturing sales figures refer to the guilder value of manufacturers' sales and are usually published one to two weeks before manufacturing production figures which show the rise or fall in volume terms.
CBS said sales in the food and consumer goods industries rose a strong six percent in May 1997 from a year earlier.
CBS said sales in the woodwork and building material industries slipped by five percent in May 1997 compared with a year ago, but it added sales in this sector had been at a high level in 1996.
